Data: Oram to Ponting, no run good length and Ponting comes forward, the bounce surprises him and it takes the shoulder of the bat and flies to Broom at backward point
Oram to Ponting, no run good length and Ponting waits for the ball this time and guides to Broom at backward point
Oram to Ponting, no run identical delivery and result as this time Broom does even better, diving further, to save the single
Oram to Ponting, 2 runs back of a length and eased behind point, using the pace, and they take two to third man
Oram to Ponting, 1 run fuller this time and Ponting sees it early and tries to hit over mid off but it takes the edge and loops over backward point to Tuffey at third man
Oram to Clarke, no run fuller and driven neatly to mid on
Tuffey to Ponting, no run short and wide but cut straight to point
Tuffey to Ponting, no run back of a length and Ponting drives but gets it high on the bat and Guptill moves in quickly to save one
Tuffey to Ponting, no run good channel from Tuffey and Ponting tries to force it through the off side but gets a bottom edge into the ground
Tuffey to Ponting, no run good length and driven off the back foot to point
Tuffey to Ponting, 3 runs fuller in length and Ponting drives but closes the face at the last second and works it throguh forward square leg for three
Tuffey to Clarke, 1 run good length but the line of middle stump allows Clarke to push towards mid on and get a sharp single
Oram to Clarke, no run angled into middle and worked towards mid wicket where Styris surprises many by diving to save the single
Oram to Clarke, no run back of a length and Clarke pushes back to the bowler
Oram to Clarke, no run shorter and wider and Clarke pushes to point
Oram to Clarke, no run slower ball attacking the stumps and Clarke works it to mid wicket where Styris moves well to prevent one
Oram to Clarke, 1 run full and driven to long on
Oram to Ponting, FOUR runs back of a length and Ponting drives on the up through cover point for four. Amazing timing and just a touch of class
Tuffey to Clarke, no run good length and driven on the up back to the bowler
Tuffey to Clarke, no run Tuffey really settling on his length and Clarke drives to cover
Tuffey to Clarke, 1 run slower ball on off stump allows Clarke to work it through the leg side to rotate the strike
Tuffey to Ponting, no run back to his length and Ponting pushes back to Tuffey
Tuffey to Ponting, no run good length and Ponting pushes in the air towards the bowler, Tuffey dives to collect it on the bounce. Great agility from the big man
Tuffey to Ponting, 1 run good length and Ponting pushes into the covers where Guptill dives but parries it towards mid off and they have enough time to get a single
Oram to Ponting, 1 run good length again as the New Zealanders really look to settle on a length and he pushes back through mid on to the man on the fence
Oram to Clarke, no run good length and Cl
Oram to Clarke, 2 runs straighter again and Clarke whips it through forward square leg to the man of the rope for a couple
Oram to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and pushes to long on
Oram to Ponting, 1 run Ponting is pushing towards mid off and steals a quick single
Oram to Clarke, 1 run back of a length and Clarke pushes nicely with soft hands towards Southee at mid off again and he's weighted it pefectly to get a single
Tuffey to Clarke, 1 run full and wide and driven majestically through the off side field to the sweeper
Tuffey to Ponting, 1 run full slower ball driven to long on
Tuffey to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke uses his feet and hits on the up over extra cover for four, good stroke
Tuffey to Clarke, 1 run back of a length and Clarke defends with soft hands into the off side and they take a quick single
Tuffey to Ponting, no run full and driven to mid wicket off the inside half of the bat
Tuffey to Ponting, no run good length and Ponting pushes back to the bowler
Oram to Clarke, 1 run back of a length and wider of off stump and Clarke cuts to the off side sweeper
Oram to Ponting, no run angled into the pads and Ponting misses out as it takes him on the thigh and falls into the leg side
Oram to Ponting, no run good length and driven to backward point
Oram to Ponting, 1 run Ponting moves back and pushes through the covers to the off side sweeper
Oram to Clarke, no run good length and Clarke pushes into the off side and looks for a quick single but Ponting says no and Clarke is back safely
Oram to Clarke, no run full and straight and clipped to mid wicket. The players take a well earned drinks break
Tuffey to Ponting, 1 run straight enough for Ponting to work it through foward square leg to the leg side sweeper
Tuffey to Clarke, no run attacks the stumps again and Clarke defends into the on side
Tuffey to Clarke, FOUR runs short delivery and Clarke pulls through wide mid on for four past Bond who is inside the circle
Tuffey to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke uses his feet and hits over extra cover for four, good intent from Clarke
Tuffey to Clarke, no run comes forward and drives to mid on, he looked for the single but hit it too well

Tuffey to Clarke, OUT Clarke comes down the track and Tuffey bends his back and surprises Clarke as he tries to guide it fine through third man but it takes the outside edge and through to McCullum to complete the catch
Oram to Ponting, no run good length and driven to mid on
Oram to Ponting, no run back of a length and pushed into the off side
Oram to Ponting, 1 run fuller and Ponting is half forward and pushing into the leg side through forward square leg
Oram to White, no run back of a length and allowed through to the keeper
Oram to White, no run full and driven to cover. White just biding his time before he explodes later in the innings
Oram to White, FOUR runs bumper to finish from Oram and White hooks off the top edge fine of long leg for four
Tuffey to Ponting, no run good length on off stump and Ponting defends into the off side. You won't get through that defence
Tuffey to Ponting, 1 run slower ball driven to long on with ease. Ponting just looking to take minimal risks while he sets up the innings
Tuffey to White, no run good channel just outside off and White allows it through to McCullum
Tuffey to White, 2 runs good length and White plays late, hitting on top of the bounce, through backward point for a couple to third man
Tuffey to White, FOUR runs shorter and White slashes off the back foot and it takes a thick outside edge and runs fine of third man for four
Tuffey to White, no run full and wide of off and White is in behind and defending into the off side
Franklin to Ponting, no run good length angling across Ponting and he pushes into the off side
Franklin to Ponting, no run full and Ponting plays too early and drives off the inside half of the bat to mid on
Franklin to Ponting, 1 run he waits longer for the ball to arrive this time and drives nicely to long off
Franklin to White, no run good channel and defended into the leg side
Franklin to White, no run good channel attacking middle stump and pushed back to the bowler
Franklin to White, 1 run full and driven to long off. Good start from Franklin
Southee to White, 1 run full and angled into the pads and worked to wide mid on
Southee to Ponting, 1 run full and driven back at the bowler who can't hold onto it
Southee to White, 1 run short and pulled through forward square leg to the leg side sweeper

Southee to Ponting, no run shortish from Southee, Ponting looks to pull, replays show it takes a bottom edge and through to McCullum who appeals along with the bowler but local umpire Tony Hill says not out
Southee to Ponting, no run full and driven back out Southee who does well to prevent the single even though he doesn't stop it cleanly
Southee to Ponting, 1 run back of a length and driven through the off side field to the sweeper
Franklin to Ponting, 1 run full on middle and driven off the middle of the bat to long off
Franklin to White, no run back of a length and pushed into the leg side
Franklin to White, FOUR runs good length but White knows mid on is insside the circle and he drives in the air through that region for four
Franklin to White, 2 runs full and driven back past the bowler for a couple to long off
Franklin to White, 1 run full and driven to long off
Franklin to Ponting, FOUR runs just a fraction straight and Ponting plays it nice and late, using the pace, and gets it fine of short fine leg and it races away for four
Southee to White, 1 run angled into the pads and whipped off his hip to deep backward square
Southee to Ponting, 2 runs full and driven sweetly back past the bowler for a couple as long on moves around to collect
Southee to Ponting, 1 run back and driven through the off side to the sweeper
Southee to White, 1 run short and cut to the off side sweeper
Southee to Ponting, 1 run good length and Ponting attacks, driving off the inside half of the bat to deep backward square
Southee to White, no run good length attacking off stump and White defends into the off side
Franklin to Ponting, no run back of a length on middle stump and played back to the bowler
Franklin to Ponting, FOUR runs good length and wide of off stump and Ponting throws his hands at it and it takes the inside edge and just misses the leg stump and runs away for four
Franklin to Ponting, no run fullish and driven firmly back at the bowler
Franklin to Ponting, 1 run good length but Ponting plays it later this time and stands tall, driving down the ground to long off
Franklin to White, 1 run decent length on middle stump and White pushes down the gorund for a single to long off
Franklin to Ponting, 1 run back of a length and Ponting rolls his wrists on the ball, working it through the leg side to the sweeper
Styris to Ponting, 1 run short and pulled through square leg to the sweeper
Styris to White, no run back of a length and driven back to the bowler off the back shoe
Styris to White, 1 run rolls his fingers across the ball and is full and White drives neatly to long on
Styris to Ponting, 1 run full and straight and whipped through the leg side to the square leg boundary rider
Styris to White, 1 run full and angled into leg stump and White picks it up and plays through deep backward square to the man on the rope
Styris to Ponting, 1 run wider of off stump and Ponting uses the pace to play to Franklin at deep point

Franklin to Ponting, OUT Franklin rolls his fingers over the ball and Ponting plays too early, it takes the bat closer to the stickers than the middle and floats in the air towards cover and Guptill runs to his right, sticks his right hand out high into the air and
Franklin to Hussey, no run back of a length and allowed through to McCullum
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run angled into middle and Hussey clips it through mid wicket to the leg side sweeper
Franklin to White, no run good length attacking middle stump and pushed back to the bowler
Franklin to White, no run angled down the leg side and it clips White's pad on the way through to McCullum
Franklin to White, 1 run good length but White shows more intent and pushes to long on for a single
Bond to White, 1 run immediately bends his back and White pulls through mid wicket for a single to the leg side boundary rider
Bond to Hussey, no run great channel from Bond and Hussey lets it go. That one was very close to off stump
Bond to Hussey, no run good length and Hussey drives off the inside half of the blade to mid on

Bond to Hussey, 1 run Hussey works it into mid wicket where Oram moves in from mid on to collect and he seems to place his left foot awkwardly and twists his left knee and he goes down in a real heap! He is in a lot of pain and it being carried off by his teammates
Bond to White, no run good length and allowed through to the keeper
Bond to White, no run 142 kph, back of a length and White is content on allowing it through to McCullum
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run draws Hussey forward into a defensive push into the off side where they sneak a quick single
Franklin to White, no run full and worked to mid wicket
Franklin to White, no run good length on middle stump and White pushes into the leg side and Taylor moves well from mid wicket towards the bowlers stumps to prevent the single
Franklin to White, no run shapes across White and he pushes into the covers where Guptill fields safely
Franklin to White, no run angled back towards the stumps and pushed back to the bowler
Franklin to White, no run good length and White pushes to cover where Guptill moves quickly to his right to prevent a possible single
Bond to Hussey, FOUR runs full and pushed back past the bowler through mid off and it runs down the slope for four. Imaculate timing
Bond to Hussey, no run better length and defended into the off side
Bond to Hussey, 1 wide bumper from Bond and it's just too short as it's called wide by the square leg umpire
Bond to Hussey, no run searing yorker from Bond but Hussey is equal to the task and digs it out into the off side
Bond to Hussey, no run full length and driven off the inside half of the bat to mid wicket
Bond to Hussey, no run another yorker from Bond and Hussey drives to cover
Bond to Hussey, no run full and wide of off stump and driven to cover
Franklin to White, no run Franklin settling in nicely on middle stump and pushed to mid wicket
Franklin to White, no run good channel and White pushes to mid wicket where Taylor dives full stretch to save the single
Franklin to White, no run full on middle and driven powerfully back to Franklin
Franklin to White, no run back of a length and White plays a fraction too early as he looks to play through the off side but he drags it back towards the bowler
Franklin to White, no run around the wicket to White and all he can do is play back to the bowler. The pressure is building...
Franklin to White, 1 run good length and White plays later this time and uses the full face to good effect, pushing to long off
Bond to White, no run 147 kph, Bond goes for the yorker and it's quick. White looks to work it through mid wicket but plays it too early and gets a leading edge to mid wicket
Bond to White, no run back of a length and played into the off side
Bond to White, no run 144 kph, good length and White drives nicely but straight to Guptill who shapes to throw the stumps down with his left arm. I hope he's been practising
Bond to White, 1 run good length and driven through point to the off side sweeper
Bond to Hussey, no run 142 kph, Bond continues to bend his back and hits a good length and Hussey defends into the on side
Bond to Hussey, 1 run back of a lenth and Hussey plays it nicely, he gets close to it and lets it come, pushing to backward point for a single
Franklin to Hussey, no run half volley on middle hit straight back at the bowler
Franklin to Hussey, 2 runs jsut outside off and guided to third man where Bond does well to prevent the boundary as he had to move a long way
Franklin to Hussey, 2 runs guided again to Bond at third man and he cheekily takes two when it wasn't really on, well run
Franklin to Hussey, no run back of a length and played to backward point where Broom does well to save the single
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run knocked into the off side, Broom charges in from point, picks it up cleanly and the throw just misses, that would've been very close
Franklin to White, 2 runs driven hard into the ground over the tall figure of Guptill at cover and long off has to move around to collect
Styris to Hussey, 1 run too straight and worked through the leg side to the sweeper
Styris to White, no run angled into middle and leg and he clips it to mid wicket
Styris to White, 1 run White steps away to the leg side and drives through mid off
Styris to Hussey, no run Hussey looks to use the pace and guide it fine but misses
Styris to Hussey, 1 run fuller and pushed into the off side
Styris to White, 1 run steps away to leg again and Styris follows him nicely but he pushes down through mid on to the man on the rope
Tuffey to White, OUT Tuffey strikes right away with the new-ish ball as he hits a good length, it seams back in just a fraction and White plays all around it. Big strike for New Zealand
Tuffey to Hopes, no run good length and pushed to mid off when he calls yes then immediately no
Tuffey to Hopes, no run good length and pushed into the off side
Tuffey to Hopes, 1 run difficult length to handle from Tuffey and he guides it to third man

Tuffey to Hussey, 2 runs nicely played with soft hands to point for a quick single, the throw at the bowlers' stumps misses and Ingram is backing up but it goes through his legs and they take an overthrow
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run good length but Hussey is positive and pushing firmly through cover to the sweeper
Styris to Hussey, no run rolls his fingers across this one and Hussey plays awkwardly back to the bowler
Styris to Hussey, 1 run full and wide and crunched through the covers to the man on the fence
Styris to Hopes, no run changeup from Styris and clipped to mid wicket
Styris to Hopes, no run slower yorker from Styris and Hopes pushes into the covers
Styris to Hopes, 2 runs good length from Styris and Hopes uses the pace and pushes to backward point where it runs away nicely for a couple
Styris to Hopes, no run good length and pushed into the off side. Good over from Styris
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run half volley outside off an Hussey drives nicely to the off side sweeper
Tuffey to Hopes, no run slower ball from Tuffey and Hopes drives on the up to Guptill at cover
Tuffey to Hopes, no run full and cracked straight to mid wicket. Very well timed
Tuffey to Hopes, no run good length and driven towards extra cover but Guptill dives beautifully to his right to stop the single
Tuffey to Hopes, 1 run full and wider and driven through cover to the sweeper
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run fuller again and driven sweetly through the off side field to the boundary rider
Styris to Hussey, 1 run slower ball is short and Hussey pulls to deep backward square
Styris to Hopes, no run back of a length at middle stump and he works it to Broom at square leg
Styris to Hopes, 1 run back of a length on leg stump and worked behind square where Broom dives to restrict the scoring to one
Styris to Hussey, 1 run Hussey moves back and drives through the covers
Styris to Hopes, 1 run full on middle and hammered to long on, superb timing with just an economy of effort
Styris to Hussey, 1 run full and whipped into mid wicket

Tuffey to Hussey, no run Hussey plays into straight mid wicket, Guptill dives full stretch to save the single, Hopes has advanced down the track at the non-strikers end the throw from Guptill misses and Hopes would've been out
Tuffey to Hussey, 2 runs too straight and Hussey uses the pace and works it off his hip for a couple as Styris runs back from short fine leg
Tuffey to Hussey, no run full and drvien straight to cover. That's a small victory for Tuffey, Hussey barely ever hits the fieldsman
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run full again and driven sweetly to long off
Tuffey to Hopes, 1 run good length and driven on the up back past the bowler, Tuffey gets a finger to it but it runs away towards long off

Tuffey to Hussey, no run full and driven towards mid off but Taylor moves quickly from cover to his left to prevent the single. New Zealand have done a good job in the field so far to keep as much pressure on the batsmen as possible
Styris to Hopes, no run angled into leg stump and worked to mid wicket
Styris to Hopes, 1 run angled down leg and clipped to backward square leg where Ingram moves quickly to pick up
Styris to Hussey, 1 run Hussey improvises and laps it fine to short fine leg
Styris to Hopes, no run full on middle and whipped to mid wicket
Styris to Hopes, no run rolls his fingers across it and Hopes drives to cover

Styris to Hopes, no run another slower ball and Hopes clips it in the air to Taylor at mid wicket. Taylor gets low and picks the ball up and is unsure whether or not he has caught it. They go upstairs and it looks as if it has bounced just in front of his hands
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run yorker length played nicely back past the bowler, Hussey looks for the second but can't get it
Franklin to Hopes, 1 run good length and driven on the up in the air through mid on down to long on
Franklin to Hussey, no run good length has Hussey driving uppishly back to the bowler
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run angled into the pads and whipped to mid wicket where Guptill runs around and fires the throw back to McCullum who takes the bails off and Hopes dives to make his ground
Franklin to Hopes, no run fullish and wide of off and Hopes plays an expansive drive but misses
Franklin to Hopes, 1 run good length hits Hopes dead in line with off stump but Rudi says not out and signals runs
Styris to Hopes, FOUR runs angled down leg and Hopes clips it square of short fine leg and it runs away for four across this rapid outfield
Styris to Hopes, 1 run fullish and worked into the on side
Styris to Hussey, no run good length and played back at the bowler
Styris to Hussey, 2 runs full and provides just enough width for Hussey to square drive to the man on the fence at cover for a well run two
Styris to Hussey, no run good length driven to cover
Styris to Hussey, 1 run slower ball is full and driven to long off
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run back of a length and just enough width to guide to third man
Franklin to Hopes, no run full and wide and cracked to Guptill's right who does well to prevent a run
Franklin to Hopes, no run quicker ball from Franklin takes Hopes by surprise and hits the stickers as he tries to pull, it goes in the air and falls just short of Taylor at mid wicket
Franklin to Hopes, 1 run shorter and cracked through the off side field to the sweeper
Franklin to Hussey, FOUR runs half volley outside off and Hussey drives magnificently through extra cover for four, beating the off side sweeper. Glorious timing from Mr. Cricket
Franklin to Hussey, 2 runs full and down leg this time and Hussey works it behind square on the lg side for a couple to Southee who has to move a long way and can't prevent the second
Tuffey to Hopes, 2 runs yorker dug out through mid wicket and Southee is called into action again but can't stop the second
Tuffey to Hopes, 1 run short and cut over point to the off side sweeper Franklin, who does well to keep the scoring to one
Tuffey to Hussey, 1 run lowe full toss driven down to Nathan McCullum at long off who is quick enough to stop the second
Tuffey to Hopes, FOUR runs low full toss well wide of off stump and Hopes throws his top hand towards the ball and it hits the middle and races away through square third man for four
Tuffey to Hopes, no run full again and driven firmly but straight to Guptill at cover
Tuffey to Hopes, 1 run square driven nicely to the off side sweeper
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs slower ball and Hussey swings it away high into the leg side and it pitches in the outfield at deep backward square and stops and they get two
Southee to Hussey, 1 run slower ball yorker driven to long off, well bowled
Southee to Hopes, 1 run genuine yorker from Southee and Hopes plays to cover on the 30m ring
Southee to Hussey, 1 bye slower length ball from Southee and Hussey swings and misses but it bounces in front of McCullum and he can't pick it up cleanly and they take a bye

Southee to Hopes, OUT Southee strikes with the yorker. If it ain't broke why fix it seems to be the mindset from Southee as Hopes tries to swing it over mid wicket but the ball cannons into middle stump
Southee to Johnson, 1 run yorker length again dug out to long on to get off the mark
Bond to Johnson, no run slower ball and Johnson doesn't pick it up early enough and he plays with softs hands back to the bowler
Bond to Johnson, 1 run length ball and Johnson heaves it into the on side off the inside edge to short fine leg
Bond to Hussey, 2 runs low full toss and he swings it through straight mid wicket for a couple to Nathan McCullum who moves quickly around from long on
Bond to Hussey, FOUR runs advances slightly and tries to play through the off side, it takes the inside edge and races away through the vacant fine leg for four
Bond to Hussey, OUT Bond goes full but not quite yorker length and he looks to swing it over the leg side but misses and it clips the outside of off stump and the bails trickle off the stumps
Bond to Hauritz, 1 run full and Hauritz uses the pace to play to short third man
Southee to Hopes, 2 runs low full toss first up and Hopes drives in the air through extra cover for a couple
Southee to Hopes, 1 run yorker length but he gets underneath it and hammers it straight down the ground to long on
Southee to Hussey, 1 run yorker dug out to cover
Southee to Hopes, 2 runs full and Hopes uses his feet and cracks it past the bowler to long off where Guptill slides nicely to pick it up but can't prevent the second
Southee to Hopes, 1 run Hopes clears his front hip and tries to smash it over mid wicket but he hits the yorker length and can only ig it out to mid wicket inside the circle
Southee to Hussey, FOUR runs Southee goes for the yorker and Hussey plays the lap and gets it over short fine leg for four, great shot and he timed the pants off it
Bond to Hopes, no run slower ball is shortish from Bond and Hopes is beaten by the lack of pace and cue-ends the ball back to the bowler
Bond to Hopes, 1 run 143kph, searing yorker and Hopes can only dig it out to long on
Bond to Hussey, 2 runs yorker length cracked through the off side to the man on the fence
Bond to Hussey, 1 run another yorker driven nicely to cover where Taylor fields well with one hand to save the second
Bond to Hopes, 1 run good length and Hopes backs away to leg and cuts to the off side sweeper
Bond to Hussey, 1 run yorker dug out to Taylor at extra cover and that's Hussey's fifty. Well played. A typical grafting knock with only three boundaries from Mr. Cricket
Southee to Hauritz, 1 run low full toss and Hauritz drives powerfully back towards the bowler, Southee gets a hand to it back they get an easy single
Southee to Johnson, SIX runs Southee finally misses his length and Johnson gets underneath it over extra cover and it drops just over the rope, over the head of Nathan McCullum in the deep
Southee to Johnson, 1 run yorker length dug out firmly back to the bowler but Southee isn't ready for it and it riccochets towards mid wicket
Southee to Hauritz, 1 run another yorker dug out towards mid off
Southee to Johnson, FOUR runs low full toss and Johnson hits it as clean as a whistle over extra cover for one bounce four
Southee to Johnson, no run slower ball and Johnson is beaten by a lack of pace as he tries to sweep it into the leg side and misses. Well disguised and good use of his variations by Southee
Tuffey to Hauritz, 1 run yorker dug out to long on. New Zealand have bowled very well at the death
Tuffey to Johnson, 1 run low full toss whipped into the leg side to deep mid wicket where Ingram fields well
Tuffey to Hauritz, OUT Tuffey bowls a half volley and Hauritz gets under it and chips it to long off where Nathan McCullum dives low to catch it after initially misjudging it
Tuffey to Johnson, FOUR runs short and straight-pulled over long on for a one bounce four with the man at long on quite square
Tuffey to Johnson, 2 runs yorker clubbed out to deep mid wicket which allows them to grab a couple
Tuffey to Johnson, 1 run yorker played out to deep mid wicket be he isn't able to find the gap and can only get one
Can McCullum continue his recent run of form or will Bollinger, Harris and Johnson be far too good?

Join us in 30 minutes when New Zealand begin their chase against a very very good Australian pace attack. It will be interesting to see how much of a difference Doug Bollinger makes after not playing the T20Is.

Right, well New Zealand will be rather pleased with their effort to restrict Australia to under 300. Most of the Australian batsmen got starts but they seemed to struggle with the pace of the wicket at times and were unable to push on. Some good death bowling from Southee
The sun is setting to a magnificent red sky... the weather will be fine tomorrow!
Harris to McCullum, 1 run Harris starts well, bending his back and McCullum back cuts to third man to get underway
Harris to Ingram, 1 run attacking the stumps and Ingram works it into the leg side to get away
Harris to McCullum, 1 run back of a length again and McCullum guides strongly through backward point to third man

Harris to Ingram, 1 leg bye Harris attacks the stumps again and Ingram is crease bound looking to clip it through mid wicket, it takes him on the front pad and they appeal but given not out and they take a leg bye as it flies past second slip
Harris to McCullum, FOUR runs McCullum advances and square drives through point for four. That's the same kind of intent that McCullum showed on Sunday night in Christchurch
Harris to McCullum, no run Harris draws McCullum forward but he's beaten by some late inswing and taken high on the front pad, the appeal is loud but given not out
Bollinger to Ingram, no run bumper first up from Bollinger and Ingram sees it late and ducks and it takes him on the shoulder
Bollinger to Ingram, no run back of a length and Ingram drives off the back foot from the inside half of the bat into the off side
Bollinger to Ingram, FOUR runs short again and wide of off stump and Ingram tries to pull from well outside off and he top edges it over the keeper for four
Bollinger to Ingram, no run back of a length again from Bollinger and Ingram mistimes a back foot drive into the off side

Bollinger to Ingram, 1 run good length again but a better line this time attacking off stump and Ingram is squared up trying to defend back down the pitch, it takes the outside edge past second slip for a single to third man
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length again just on or outside off and McCullum is tightly in behind it and defending into the off side and he looks for one but Ingram sends him back
Harris to Ingram, no run Harris draws Ingram forward and he defends off the outside edge to second slip
Harris to Ingram, no run back of a length and Ingram drives off the back foot to mid off
Harris to Ingram, 1 run fuller angled into middle stump and Ingram works it to mid on where Johnson fields and throws at the stumps but misses and Ingram would have been out
Harris to McCullum, 1 run angled down leg and McCullum works it off his hip with one hand to fine leg. McCullum looking very aggressive early on
Harris to Ingram, FOUR runs he attacks the pads again and Ingram waits for it and times it perfectly through backward square for four
Harris to Ingram, no run back of a length attacking middle stump and Ingram is beaten for pace and taken high on the pads
Bollinger to McCullum, no run straight delivery and McCullum tries to play it fine but it takes him on the thigh and bounces back down the pitch
Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs shortish and McCullum rocks back and pulls sweetly past Johnson at fine leg for four

Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs shortish again and McCullum is onto it quickly and pulling through backward square for four more. Johnson dives on the boundary and gets a hand to it but can't stop it from crossing the rope
Bollinger to McCullum, no run McCullum charges and leaves well outside off
Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs half volley outside off and McCullum plays a text book cover drive for four. That's a beauty and extremely well timed
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length angled across McCullum and he tries to whip it through the leg side but misses. Interesting shot but that's what we come to expect from the dynamo
Harris to Ingram, no run back of a length and respected from Ingram who allows it through to the keeper
Harris to Ingram, no run good length again and Ingram is content on leaving outside off
Harris to Ingram, no run fullish length enticing Ingram into driving on the up and he plays to mid off
Harris to Ingram, no run full slower ball and Ingram drives to Hauritz at mid off

Harris to Ingram, 1 leg bye 149 kph, back of a length angling into the pads and Ingram is beaten for pace trying to flick through the leg side, it takes his pad and flies past second slip to allow a leg bye
Harris to McCullum, no run 145 kph, McCullum charges the bowler again and attempts an ambitious drive but misses
Bollinger to Ingram, no run back of a length and hit powerfully off the back foot to point where Clarke dives to field the ball
Bollinger to Ingram, no run good length and Ingram pushes with soft hands into the off side
Bollinger to Ingram, no run 144 kph, back of a length but wider this time which allows Ingram to free the arms and swing to Clarke at point
Bollinger to Ingram, FOUR runs back of a length and Ingram gets closer to this one, allows it to come and punches off the back foot through the covers for four
Bollinger to Ingram, 1 run back of a length and Ingram plays with soft hands into the off side and sneaks a quick single, well played
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length and McCullum pushes to backward point
Harris to Ingram, no run good channel from Harris and Ingram looks to drive off the back foot but misses
Harris to Ingram, FOUR runs cross seam in a good channel again but Ingram punches through point off the back foot for four, he didn
Harris to Ingram, no run good length and driven back into the pitch hard and Harris gets a hand to it to stop the single
Harris to Ingram, FOUR runs good length but gives Ingram width and he frees his arms again and hits over extra cover for four
Harris to Ingram, no run fuller in at middle and leg and he plays to mid on who is quite close to the bat
Harris to Ingram, no run straighter and angled w leg, Imgram tries to go inside the line and whip it into the leg side but he misses and it takes him on the thigh and trickles towards square leg
Johnson to McCullum, no run good length and McCullum moves back and defends into the off side
Johnson to McCullum, FOUR runs bumper and pulled off the top edge down fine of fine leg who dives over it and it goes for four
Johnson to McCullum, no run slower ball short delivery and he pulls but is beaten by a lack of pace and it takes him in the ribs
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run short outside off stump and McCullum ramps it over the cordon to third man
Johnson to Ingram, no run angled into the poads, he tries to flick it through the leg side but misses
Johnson to Ingram, no run fuller outside off and Ingram drives to mid off
Hopes to McCullum, no run slower ball just outside off and McCullum defends back down the pitch
Hopes to McCullum, no run good length and McCullum maintains his shape and drives neatly to cover
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run back of a length and he pushes off the back foot past the bowler to mid off
Hopes to Ingram, no run fuller this time and he swings it in the air on the bounce to Harris at mid off
Hopes to Ingram, 1 run driven on the up through the covers for a couple with Harris and Clarke combining in the deep
Hopes to Ingram, FOUR runs good length attacking off stump and Ingram whips it through the leg side in the air towards the sweeper but it's hit too well and races away for four
Johnson to McCullum, 2 runs full and straight and McCullum walks across his stumps and clips it through mid wicket for a couple
Johnson to McCullum, no run full and straight again and McCullum times it sweetly to mid on
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run shorter delivery and McCullum mistimes the pull in the air towards Harris at fine leg
Johnson to Ingram, 1 run yorker worked into the leg side to mid on for a quick single
Johnson to McCullum, 2 leg byes angled down leg and McCullum misses but it takes him on the thigh pad and runs fine for a couple as long leg runs around
Johnson to McCullum, 2 runs full and driven through point where Clarke gets in a tangle with the umpire and misfields which allows a second run
Hopes to Ingram, FOUR runs the keeper is back with Ingram on strike and Ingram drives on the up over extra cover for four, super stroke
Hopes to Ingram, FOUR runs full again and driven powerfully to mid off where Harris lets it go straight through his legs for four
Hopes to Ingram, no run bouncer from Hopes and Ingram goes comfortably underneath
Hopes to Ingram, 1 run straighter and whipped from off stump into the leg side
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run back of a length and guided to short third man for a quick single
Hopes to Ingram, 1 run angled into the pads and Ingram gets an inside edge into the leg side
Johnson to Ingram, no run full again and driven to cover

Johnson to Ingram, OUT fullish delivery and Ingram drives in the air over mid off, Hussey moves back very quickly and takes a great catch over his shoulder and has to fall to the ground to complete the catch. Superb snare from Mr. Cricket
Johnson to McCullum, no run bumper from Johnson and McCullum goes safely underneath as it's very short but not called wide by the square leg umpire
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run back of a length outside off and guided to third man
Johnson to Guptill, no run 144 kph, full outside off and left alone
Johnson to Guptill, no run 144 kph, good length and Guptill is solidly in behind and defending into the off side
Bollinger to McCullum, no run full otuside off and McCullum drives powerfully to cover
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length on middle stump and McCullum plays back to the bowler
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length pushed into the covers
Bollinger to McCullum, 1 run back of a length into the pads and clipped to short fine leg and they take a quick single. Guptill is home safely, gee he's sharp between the wickets
Bollinger to Guptill, no run good length again and defended off the middle of the back into the point region
Bollinger to Guptill, no run tidy length and Guptill defends back along the pitch
Johnson to McCullum, 2 runs shortish in at the pads and McCullum works it fine for a couple to long leg
Johnson to McCullum, no run good channel again and defended to point
Johnson to McCullum, FOUR runs short ball and pulled powerfully for four through backward sqaure, good stroke
Johnson to McCullum, no run yorker dug out into the off side
Johnson to McCullum, no run slower ball and McCullum is beaten by the lack of pace, well bowled
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run low full toss driven through point to the off side sweeper
Bollinger to McCullum, 1 run short and wide and McCullum cuts over backward point to third man
Bollinger to Guptill, no run 142 kph, good bumper from Bollinger which Guptill doesn't pick up too early and he goes underneath it awkwardly
Bollinger to Guptill, 1 run fuller and he uses the pace and angle from Bollinger to defend backward of point to third man
Bollinger to McCullum, no run defended into the off side
Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs good length and he drives off the inside edge past the stumps for four with fine leg up inside the circle
Johnson to Guptill, no run good length attacking the stumps and defended into the off side
Johnson to Guptill, no run angling across Guptill and he drives to point
Johnson to Guptill, no run good length again and played into the off side
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run low full toss driven to the off side sweeper
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run in at the pads and Taylor is straight underway first ball playing to long leg
Johnson to Guptill, no run 146 kph, good length and defended into the off side
Bollinger to Taylor, 1 run attacking the hip and he works it into the leg side for an easy single
Bollinger to Guptill, 1 run short and wide enough for Guptill to cut to the off side boundary rider
Bollinger to Taylor, no run short and wide and cut off the bottom edge straight into the ground
Bollinger to Taylor, 1 run back of a length and worked off the hip to square leg for a quick single
Bollinger to Guptill, 1 run Bollinger continues to bend his back and Guptill drives square off the back foot to the point sweeper
Bollinger to Taylor, no run full and driven off the inside half of the bat to mid off
Johnson to Guptill, no run back of a length and Guptill slashes off the back foot but misses
Johnson to Guptill, no run 146 kph, good bumper takes Guptill on the gloves as it beats him for pace, great delivery
Johnson to Guptill, no run 146 kph, half volley on off stump and Guptill drives with assurity to mid off
Johnson to Guptill, no run slower ball back of a length and Guptill plays to Ponting at backward point
Johnson to Guptill, no run 145 kph, back of a length and Guptill tries to guide it fine but misses. Just looking a touch timid today Guptill and when he's at his best he shows great intent.
Johnson to Guptill, 1 leg bye full and in at the pads and Guptill misses out as it takes him on the pad and rolls into the leg side for a leg bye
Hopes to Guptill, no run good length into the pads and Guptill pushes to mid on
Hopes to Guptill, 1 run good length angled into the body and Guptill collects off the hip into the leg side
Hopes to Taylor, no run back of a length and cut to Ponting at backward point
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run good length and Taylor uses soft hands and plays into the off side for a quick single
Hopes to Guptill, no run back of a length and Guptill drives on the up to Clarke at cover
Hopes to Guptill, no run angled into the pads and Guptill plays it straight to mid wicket and shows some frustration byt hitting his bat on the ground
Watson to Taylor, no run good channel from Watson and Taylor watches it go through to the keeper
Watson to Taylor, 1 run back of a length and pushed into the off side for a quick single
Watson to Guptill, no run fuller and driven to mid off
Watson to Guptill, no run bumper this time and Guptill tries to ramp it over the cordon bu misses
Watson to Guptill, 1 wide angled down the leg side and called wide
Watson to Guptill, no run full and Guptill tries to drive but he's struggling for timing for once in his career and he drags it into the off side
Watson to Guptill, no run good length on off stump and driven into the covers
Hopes to Taylor, no run good length in at the hip and Taylor pushes into the on side
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run Taylor moves forward and pushes into the off side for an easy single
Hopes to Guptill, FOUR runs slower ball back of a length and he waits for it nicely, playing it much later, and drives off the back foot through cover for four
Hopes to Guptill, no run back of a length and driven off the inside edge to mid wicket
Hopes to Franklin, no run draws him forward and pushes into the off side
Watson to Taylor, 1 run good length brings him forward and Taylor pushes off the outside edge to third man
Watson to Franklin, no run good length angled well across the left handed Franklin and he watches it go through to the keeper
Watson to Franklin, no run good length and pushed to point. Australia just gaining some good momentum here as the scoring rate has slowed up considerably
Watson to Franklin, 1 run good length forces Franklin back and he pushes into the off side to get underway
Watson to Taylor, 1 run attacks the stumps and Taylor is nicely in behind it and playing off the middle of the bat into the leg side to the sweeper
Watson to Franklin, no run good length and Franklin stays on the crease and plays back to the bowler
Hopes to Taylor, no run slower ball which Taylor sees early and he pushes back along the pitch
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run good length and Taylor waits on the crease and pushes nicely into the off side for an easy single
Hopes to Franklin, 1 run draws him forward and Franklin pushes into the covers and out to the off side sweeper
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run full slower ball and Taylor waits for it and drives through the covers to the off side sweeper
Hopes to Franklin, no run half volley driven powerfully to mid off
Hopes to Franklin, no run slower ball and it's well wide of off and Franklin plays to Ponting at point
Watson to Taylor, 1 run bouncer from Watson hurries Taylor up on the pull and it flies in the air towards the man at deep backward square but falls well short in the end and they get one
Watson to Franklin, no run good channel, Franklin stays crease bound and plays and misses
Watson to Franklin, no run good length and defended into the off side
Watson to Franklin, no run good length again and played neatly to point. New Zealand just can't quite break the shackles as Australia tighten the screws

Watson to Franklin, 1 run brings Franklin forward and he defends forward of point, Ponting runs around and collects then fires it at the stumps at the bowlers end, it hits but Franklin has run too far past the stumps to get a second
Watson to Taylor, 1 run full and driven to mid on and he takes a sharp single
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run good length and played into the covers for a single
Hopes to Franklin, no run good channel from Hopes and Franklin plays and misses outside off
Hopes to Franklin, 1 run shortish and offers some width and Franklin is able to late cut to third man for a single
Hopes to Taylor, FOUR runs Taylor advances and hits it over wide long on for four, good positive stroke playing to his zones
Hopes to Taylor, SIX runs just a fraction short and Taylor loves that length when he's in the right mood and he pull/slogs over mid wicket for a maximum!
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run Hopes goes for the bumper and Taylor sees it early and pulls out to deep square leg for one
Watson to Taylor, 1 run full enough for Taylor to drive to mid off for an easy single as he gapped it nicely
Watson to Franklin, 1 run good length and Franklin moves forward and pushes to mid off and they take a good sharp single
Watson to Taylor, 1 run slower ball half volley driven to long on
Watson to Franklin, no run back of a length and Franklin defends into the off side
Watson to Franklin, no run good length draws Franklin forward and he pushes to mid off
Watson to Franklin, no run half volley crunched to mid off
Clarke to Taylor, 2 runs low full toss driven to wide long on and gapped perfectly to get a couple
Clarke to Taylor, no run yorker driven into the off side
Clarke to Taylor, no run driven back to the bowler
Clarke to Taylor, no run short and cut to short third man
Clarke to Taylor, 1 leg bye angled into the pads and Taylor misses out and it takes him on the pad and runs into the leg side
Clarke to Franklin, no run full and Franklin hits it cleanly but straight back at the bowler
Watson to Taylor, 1 run bumper from Watson and Taylor pulls off the top edge down to Harris at long leg who does well to keep the scoring to one
Watson to Franklin, 1 run back of a length and just enough width to cut to third man
Watson to Taylor, no run shortish delivery and Taylor tries to pull but misses, it takes him flush on the box and lodges in between his legs as he grimaces in pain
Watson to Taylor, FOUR runs 137 kph, half volley eased through the covers, gapped perfectly to beat the sweeper for four, classical stroke
Watson to Taylor, no run Watson attacks the stumps more this time and Taylor works it to mid wicket
Watson to Taylor, 1 run good length and Taylor drives on the up through the off side field to the sweeper
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run full and driven back past the bowler to long off
Clarke to Franklin, no run Franklin uses his feet and yorks himself and plays back to the bowler
Clarke to Franklin, 1 run tossed up and hit through mid off to the man on the fence
Clarke to Taylor, 2 runs just short enough for Taylor to move back and cut to the point boundary for a couple
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run angled in at the pads and Taylor uses soft hands perfectly to find the gap at backward square leg
Clarke to Franklin, 1 run full and straight and Franklin plays comfortably to mid wicket for an easy single
Hauritz to Franklin, 1 run angled into the pads from around the wicket and Franklin works it through square leg to the man on the rope
Hauritz to Taylor, FOUR runs short and cut nicely through backward point and it runs away quickly enough to beat the sweeper for four
Hauritz to Taylor, FOUR runs short again and Taylor cuts harder this time and Johnson misfields at short third man and it runs away for four more
Hauritz to Taylor, no run short outside off and Taylor leaves
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run short again and Taylor square drives for a single into the off side
Hauritz to Franklin, 2 leg byes angled down leg and ittakes Franklin on the thigh pad and runs fine enough for them to grab a couple
Harris to Taylor, no run great start from Harris as Taylor comes forward and it takes the bat high up near the stciks, surprising Taylor
Harris to Taylor, no run back of a length and Taylor drives on the up through point where Ponting dives and fields with one hand to save a run
Harris to Taylor, no run good channel and Taylor pushes into the off side and looks for a single but can't get it as Harris fields well off his own bowling
Harris to Taylor, FOUR runs fuller and wider and Taylor drives majestically through cover for four, beating the off side sweeper
Harris to Taylor, FOUR runs fuller in at middle stump and Taylor drop kicks it over mid wicket for four and goes bang bang, two fours in a row
Harris to Taylor, no run better length this time and Taylor plays back to the bowler. Harris isn't hhapy with the treatment he's getting and fires it back at Taylor, glancing him on the pad
Hauritz to Franklin, 1 run angled into leg stump and Franklin is down on one knee and sweeping to deep backward square
Hauritz to Taylor, no run tossed up outside off and played to cover
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run flatter this time and he pushes into the off side using the extra pace to backward point
Hauritz to Franklin, 1 run well flighted and Franklin uses his feet and hammers it through mid off to the man on the fence
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run short on middle and worked through the leg side for a comfortable single
Hauritz to Franklin, no run well flighted again and Franklin pushes to cover
Harris to Taylor, no run good length on off stump and Taylor defends into the on side, getting nicely into line
Harris to Taylor, no run half volley cracked to Clarke at cover
Harris to Taylor, 1 run Harris loses his line and strays into the pads and Taylor clips it into the leg side
Harris to Franklin, 1 run 145 kph, fuller and Franklin drives hard into the pitch towards mid off for a qucik single
Harris to Taylor, 1 run good length and Taylor comes forward and edges through second/third slip to third man
Harris to Franklin, no run bumper from Harris and Franklin goes underneath
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run slower and shorter and Taylor cuts hard to deep point

Hauritz to Franklin, OUT tossed up by Hauritz, Franklin tries to play inside the line and play the ball into the off side but it takes the outside edge and Haddin juggles it but takes it on the third attempt behind the stumps. Good catch and an important break thro
Hauritz to Broom, no run tossed up and wide of off and Broom square cuts to point
Hauritz to Broom, no run short and driven off the back foot to point
Hauritz to Broom, no run full and dsquare driven to point
Hauritz to Broom, no run fuller this time and Broom drives back to the bowler
Harris to Taylor, no run Harris continues to hit the bat hard, especially with the newer ball, and it takes Taylor high on the bat and rolls to point
Harris to Taylor, no run good length and played into the off side
Harris to Taylor, 1 run good length again and Taylor plays slightly early and pushes into the on side for a single
Harris to Broom, 1 run 145 kph, full and straight and Broom picks him off through the leg side to the sweeper in front of square
Harris to Taylor, 1 run back of a length into the hip and Taylor works it off the hip behind square
Harris to Broom, no run bumper from Harris and Broom goes nicely underneath it
Johnson to Taylor, no run full and wide from Johnson and Taylor misses out, playing and missing
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run shorter this time and Taylor stays on top of the bounce and punches it down and into the gully region for a single
Johnson to Broom, no run good channel and Broom pushes to extra cover
Johnson to Broom, FOUR runs Johnson attacks the stumps but it's a half volley on middle and Broom clips is nicely through mid wicket for four
Johnson to Broom, 1 run 145 kph, good length but a fraction too much width and Broom cuts to third man
Johnson to Taylor, no run good length and Taylor defends into the point region
Bollinger to Broom, 1 run good length and Broom plays late, guiding it to third man
Bollinger to Taylor, 1 run short enough for Taylor to get in behind it and work into the leg side for an easy single
Bollinger to Broom, 1 run good length and Broom stays on top of the bounce and plays to third man
Bollinger to Taylor, no run back of a length and Taylor tries to square drive but gets a bottom edge into the ground to Haddin behind the stumps

Bollinger to Taylor, 2 runs good length and Taylor plays into the off side in front of point, Ponting hits the stumps at the keepers' end and Broom is home safe and they take a second as the ball deflects into the outfield
Bollinger to Taylor, 1 run shortish and enough width to cut to third man for one
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run Johnson is around the wicket to Taylor and full and Taylor falls over slightly and drives to long on
Johnson to Broom, 1 run he stays around the wicket and is full again and Broom crunches it through the covers to the sweeper
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run full and wide and Taylor square drives to Ponting at point, Ponting throws at the bowlers' end where Broom is well and truly home and they take the overthrow to long on
Johnson to Broom, no run superb bumper from Johnson and Broom falls over trying to go underneath it
Johnson to Broom, 1 run back of a length and Broom is forced back and defending off the inside edge into his inside thigh and they take a qucik single, well run
Johnson to Taylor, 1 wide bumper from Johnson and it's just far too short this time
Johnson to Taylor, no run slower ball turns into a low full toss and Taylor drives staright back at Johnson without any timing
Watson to Broom, no run good length and Broom drives on the up to point where Ponting fields nicely
Watson to Broom, SIX runs Broom advances down the track and hits the ball on the up high wide and handsome over long off for six. Broom welcomes Watson to boomtown!
Watson to Broom, 1 run full and wide and Broom drives sweetly through the covers to the off side sweeper
Watson to Taylor, 1 run back of a length in at the hip, Taylor misses out and he edges it and then it takes him on the thigh pad and they scurry a quick single
Watson to Broom, 1 run slower ball is too straight from Watson and Broom works it into the leg side for an easy single

Watson to Taylor, OUT Watson goes short and hurries Taylor for room and he pulls the ball high on the bat out to mid wicket where Hussey moves around safely to complete the catch. Great break through for Australia
Harris to Styris, no run good channel and Styris allows it through to the keeper
Harris to Styris, no run better delivery gets Styris to play and he pushes to point
Harris to Styris, no run back of a length and Styris tries to push into the off side for a single but misses it completely, well bowled
Harris to Styris, no run Harris bends his back again and Stryis plays awkwardly and misses outside off looking to play to third man
Harris to Styris, 1 run good channel again and Styris uses the pace to guide it to third man
Harris to Broom, no run bumper to close from Harris and Broom tries to ramp it over the keeper but misses
Watson to Styris, no run good length at off stump and Styris defends into the off side andhe looks for a single but Broom sends him back
Watson to Styris, 1 run slower ball but Styris is able to use the width to guide it to third man off the front foot
Watson to Broom, no run full and driven strongly to cover
Watson to Broom, no run slower ball hits a good length and Broom driven back to the bowler. Really good spell from Watson, to complement his spell from earlier in the evening
Watson to Broom, no run short and Broom looks to pull, it takes the top edge into his body and loops in the air for a time before falling safely to earth
Watson to Broom, 1 run half volley on off stump and driven firmly to long off

Bollinger to Broom, OUT Bollinger hustles in and bowls back of a length and Broom looks to cut but chops it back onto his stumps. The Aussie's are joyous and Bollinger strikes again! The momentum has really shifted since Taylor's dismissal
Bollinger to Tuffey, 2 runs short ball and Tuffey is hurried on the pull but gets it back over the bowler's head for a couple through mid on
Bollinger to Tuffey, no run great length and Tuffey hangs on the crease and agles the bat towards the slips but misses
Bollinger to Tuffey, 2 runs Bollinger is short and at the hip and Tuffey whips it through mid wicket for a couple
Bollinger to Tuffey, no run half volley outside off and Tuffey drives powerfully but straight to Clarke at cover
Bollinger to Tuffey, 2 runs back of a length and Tuffey fends away from the body and hits through backward point, calling yes early, and they get a couple, well run
Watson to Styris, 2 runs good length and Styris uses the pace and guides it away behind point to a couple to third man
Watson to Styris, 1 run short and Styris pulls through backward square for a single
Watson to Tuffey, 3 runs Tuffey hist the ball on the up over extra cover, he doesn't quite time it and it doesn't go to the fence with Hopes flicking it back inside the rope and they take three
Watson to Styris, no run good channel and Stryis looks to square drive but he gets an inside edge back into his pads and along the pitch
Watson to Styris, 1 run good length but just wide enough for Styris to guide it to third man
Watson to Tuffey, 1 run slower ball and Tuffey plays early but gets it behind point to third man for a comfortable single
Johnson to Tuffey, 1 run good length and Tuffey drives on the up forward of point for a single to the sweeper
Johnson to Styris, no run good bumper from Johnson and Styris ducks underneath
Johnson to Styris, 1 run back of a length and Styris has just enough width to guide it to third man
Johnson to Tuffey, no run 150 kph, good length but wide of off stump and Tuffey plays and misses a cut shot
Johnson to Tuffey, 1 run fuller and slower and Tuffey plays early, hitting it in the air towards long off but it falls well short and they get a single
Johnson to Styris, 1 run digs out a good yorker to third man
Harris to Styris, FOUR runs 141 kph, Styris is aggressive straight away and hits on the up over extra cover for four, super stroke
Harris to Styris, no run half volley outside off and Styris crunches it to Clarke at cover
Harris to Styris, no run action replay of the previous ball as Stryis cracks it straight to cover

Harris to Styris, FOUR runs low full toss and Styris hits inside out off the outside half of the bat and over Hopes at point, the ball runs away across the outfield and Hopes can't prevent it from going for four
Harris to Styris, 1 run slower ball and Styris is through his shot early and it goes aerially towards mid off and they take a single
Johnson to Styris, 1 run full from Johnson and Styris heaves it through the leg side for a single to deep square leg
Johnson to Southee, no run 146 kph, this one is short and quick and takes Southee on the right bicep and falls into the off side. Well done from the young man as he shows no pain
Johnson to Southee, 1 run good length and Southee plays forward and edges to third man
Johnson to Styris, no run short ball and Styris tries to pull but gets it off the edge into his front pad
Johnson to Styris, FOUR runs 147 kph, bumper from Johnson with mid on and mif off up inside the circle and Styris pulls through wide mid on for four, good stroke
Johnson to Styris, FOUR runs 147 kph, Styris sits back and pulls/heaves over mid wicket for four as Harris can't run it down from mid on
Harris to Southee, 1 run yorker and Southee digs it out to Clarke at cover and calls yes, Clarke picks it up and misses and Southee was well short

Harris to Styris, 1 run, OUT 149 kph, low full toss and Styris drives is straight down the ground and he calls immediately for two, Southee looks and says no but Styris is committed and South sacrifices himself at the bowlers' end
Harris to Styris, 1 run 149 kph, yorker driven to long off for a single
Harris to Bond, 1 run short in at the hip and Bond works it behind square for one
Harris to Styris, FOUR runs half volley and Styris gets underneath it and hits it beautifully straight over the bowlers' head for four
Harris to Styris, FOUR runs full and wide and Styris waits on it, plays it late and drives through point in the gap for four
Bollinger to Bond, 1 run full from Bollinger and Bond slays it over backward point to third man for a single to get Styris on strike
Bollinger to Styris, 1 leg bye slower ball is short and Styris tries to whip it through the leg side but misses and it takes him low on the body and they take a run
Bollinger to Bond, no run great channel from Bollinger and that's too good for Bond as he looks to play to third man but misses
Bollinger to Bond, 1 run yorker driven to mid off and he calls yes and dives at the bowlers' end, the throw misses but Bond was home safe no matter what
Bollinger to Styris, FOUR runs full and wide and Styris slashes it just over the head of White at short third man and it runs away for four valuable runs

Bollinger to Styris, 1 run yorker played well by Stryis as he drives to long on to retain the strike. With two overs to go, New Zealand need 12 to win with two wickets in hand. Jacob Oram will bat if required but has injured a tendon in the field
Watson to Styris, 1 run good length and Stryis drives on the up with no timing into the off side and with the field on the edge of the ring there is an easy single on offer
Watson to Bond, FOUR runs helf volley outside off and Bond throws the kitchen sink at it and it races away for four through point
Watson to Bond, no run slower ball and Bond forces to Ponting at point

Watson to Bond, 1 leg bye angled into the pads and Bond is outside leg anyway, it takes him on the pads and runs into the off side and they take a leg bye. Great scenes from the crowd who are exceptionally loud!

Watson to Styris, 1 run good length and Styris plays to point and they take a single. Watson and the Australian's appeal as it has taken the pad first and that was a very good shout for LBW but not given
Watson to Bond, FOUR runs fullish and Bond sits back and plays off the outside half through backwars point for four
Bollinger to Styris, no run Bollinger goes yorker length but it's down leg and it takes Styris on the pad and goes to short fine leg and they can't get a single
Bollinger to Styris, SIX runs length ball from Bollinger and Styris just hits through the line and over mid off for six! What a finish and what an innings from Styris!
Thanks for joining us today and tonight. On behalf of the crew here at Cricinfo, I would like to say goodnight and we look forward to next time. Bye for now.
New Zealand take a 1-0 series lead and we head to Auckland for game two on Saturday which starts at 1200 local time and 2300 GMT on Friday night.

Ross Taylor also picks up the Man of the Match award for his run-a-ball 70 which anchored the chase. Styris will feel a little aggrieved for not picking up the award himself but I'm sure he will take enough from the match as it is.

New Zealand's stand in captain Ross Taylor can't believe the position he is in, when at the start of the day he had no idea he would captain the side. He heaps praise on all of his players, especially Styris. The loss of Oram made it difficult for him rotating his bowlers

Ponting felt his team didn't score enough runs due to the fact that nobody went on to make a big score after making a start. It is the first loss for Australia in their last 13 ODIs and Ponting is disapppointed but well aware they need to bounce back quickly for the match

Australia's bowlers fought hard right to the end, with Bollinger taking the wickets of McCullum and Broom to give the visitors a real sniff. When Southee was run out at 246, New Zealand needed 30 off 22 deliveries. Bond joined Styris and Bond hit the boundary when require

New Zealand always looked on target for victory with Ross Taylor at the wicket but when he was out from the bowling of Watson at 204 for five in the 39th over, New Zealand needed an old hand to stand up.

New Zealand win by two wickets with four balls remaining. The pressure was on him towards the death and Styris comes through with a fantastic innings under pressure. Styris was a late inclusion when Daniel Vettori had to pull out with a neck complaint and he has justified
New Zealand won by 2 wickets (with 4 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Ross Taylor, NZ
